dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
L. Shen
L. Tian
S. Wang
J. Wang
Q. Tian
dcterms:description: Market-1501 contains 32,668 labeled images of 1,501 identities collected from 6 cameras. For evaluation, 12,936 images from 751 identities are used for training, and 19,732 images from 750 identities plus some distractors form the gallery / database.
dcterms:title: Market-1501

dcterms:creator: Z. Zheng
L. Zheng
Y. Yang
dcterms:description: DukeMTMC-reID has 8 cameras and 36,411 labeled images belonging to 1,404 identities. Similar to the division of Market-1501, the dataset contains 16,522 training images from 702 identities, 2,228 query images from another 702 identities and 17,661 gallery images.
dcterms:title: DukeMTMC-reID

dcterms:creator: W. Li
R. Zhao
T. Xiao
X. Wang
dcterms:description: CUHK03 contains 14,096 images of 1,467 identities. Each identity is captured from two cameras. The dataset has two train/test settings: using labeled bounding boxes and using DPM detected bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: CUHK03
